backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing principal-scoped Airtable credentials and performing authenticated HTTP requests to load questions via http-outcalls.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file for quick reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component controlling navigation between Home, Quiz, and Result and managing quiz state.
frontend/src/data/fallbackQuestions.ts: Static set of 10 fallback quiz questions used when Airtable loading fails or isn’t configured.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing a backend actor tied to Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, state persistence, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder for query-related logic; unused since useQuestions handles backend interaction.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuestions.ts: React hook that loads quiz questions from a backend actor or falls back to default questions, with config saving and loading states.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/questionTypes.ts: Defines question and Airtable types and includes a parser converting Airtable JSON into validated Question objects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering the app.
frontend/src/screens/HomeScreen.tsx: UI for configuring Airtable credentials and starting the quiz, showing loading states and fallback behavior.
frontend/src/screens/QuizScreen.tsx: Renders a single quiz question with answer selection UI and progress tracking.
frontend/src/screens/ResultScreen.tsx: Displays quiz results, score breakdown, performance message, and restart option.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radius, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: JSON file describing the app’s build state, including project summary, architecture notes, existing implemented features, and pending feature requests for a cross‑platform quiz app using Airtable. It tracks versions, requirements, and planned functionality for Home, Quiz, and Result flows.
